/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's daily hustle and bustle. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architecture hinting at the rich history and culture of the city. A blue bridge arches over the street, adding a pop of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day, and the sun casts a bright light that illuminates the scene, enhancing the vibrancy of the colors.
